articles.description: Bollywood actor Kartik Aaryan was slapped with a penalty of Rs 1,250 for violation of two traffic rules at Prabhadevi on Friday.
articles.content: Aaryan, who had visited Siddhivinayak Temple with his parents around 1pm, was penalised allegedly for parking his luxury sports car in the wrong direction.
